definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Objective To study the diagnosis of subacute pituitary apoplexy and evaluate the surgical results.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討亞急性垂體卒中的診斷及評價手術治療效果。

sentences.english: For the sub acute or chronic problem listen carefully to the patient.
sentences.chinese: 對於亞急性和慢性患者仔細聆聽患者的主訴。

sentences.english: Acute and sub-acute hepatic necrosis more often complicates hepatitis in the elderly.
sentences.chinese: 上了年紀的肝炎患者往往併發急性與亞急性肝壞死。

sentences.english: Sub-acute thrombosis occurred in 1 patient in both groups.
sentences.chinese: 兩組各有1例亞急性血栓形成。

sentences.english: When patients resistibility, easy to have acute or subacute onset.
sentences.chinese: 當患者抵抗力差時，易有急性或亞急性發作。

sentences.english: Diagnosis and treatment of subacute thyroiditis.
sentences.chinese: 亞急性甲狀腺炎的診斷及治療。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the diagnostic value of subacute thyroiditisby fine needle aspiration cytology (FNAC).
sentences.chinese: 探討針吸細胞學診斷亞急性甲狀腺炎的價值。

sentences.english: Diagnostic criteria and principles of management for subacute radiation sickness from external exposure.
sentences.chinese: 外照射亞急性放射病診斷標準及處理原則。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the diagnosis and treatment of radiation proctitis.
sentences.chinese: 外照射亞急性放射病診斷標準及處理原則。

sentences.english: Effects of medicinal treatment and observation of thyroid morphology and thyroid function in subacute thyroiditis.
sentences.chinese: 亞急性甲狀腺炎藥物治療效果及形態與功能的觀察。

sentences.english: When patient resistivity difference, easy to have acute or the subacute outbreak.
sentences.chinese: 當患者抵抗力差時，易有急性或亞急性發作。

sentences.english: As an endocrinopathy, subacute thyroiditis is a commonly encoutered thyroid disease.
sentences.chinese: 亞急性甲狀腺炎是一種常見的甲狀腺疾病。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effects of Long Dan Du decoction (LDJDD) on the treatment of subacute thyroiditis (ST).
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察龍膽解毒湯治療亞急性甲狀腺炎的療效。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the diagnosis and treatment experience of subacute subdural hematomas in children.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結小兒亞急性硬腦膜下血腫的診治經驗。

definition: to accompany/(of a doctor etc) to do a follow-up (on a patient, client etc)
